subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Television
lead_paragraph: Mike Pereira, a former N.F.L. vice president for officiating, has assessed 28 challenges this season and been vindicated by the referees’ verdicts each time.
snippet: Mike Pereira, a former N.F.L. vice president for officiating, has assessed 28 challenges this season and been vindicated by the referees’ verdicts each time.
